query:
SELECT id, contactName, 
  rescheduledDate,
  DATE_FORMAT(CONVERT_TZ(rescheduledDate, '+00:00', '+00:00'), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s UTC') as utc_time
FROM route_waypoints 
WHERE rescheduledDate IS NOT NULL;
